meanings.definition: The quality or state of being infusible.
meanings.sent1: The infusiblenesses of the metal made it perfect for use in high-temperature applications.
meanings.sent2: The infusiblenesses of the substance made it ideal for creating durable cookware.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chef's best efforts, the infusiblenesses of the chocolate caused it to remain solid in the heat.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the infusiblenesses of the diamond.
meanings.sent5: The infusiblenesses of the rock made it stand out among the other minerals.

meanings.definition: The inability to be melted or fused by heat.
meanings.sent1: The infusiblenesses of the material made it unsuitable for casting.
meanings.sent2: The infusiblenesses of the alloy ensured its stability in extreme temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The infusiblenesses of the ice cream caused it to remain solid even under the sun.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was as unyielding as the infusiblenesses of a glacier.
meanings.sent5: The infusiblenesses of the plastic made it a reliable choice for manufacturing parts.
